Contradict fact: The claim that Shah Rukh Khan said "I will leave India if Pakistani artists are banned" contradicts the fact that there are no media reports substantiating this statement.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there are no media reports or credible sources that confirm Shah Rukh Khan made the statement.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Shah Rukh Khan made the statement without any evidence or proof.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation that the claim is a piece of misinformation or fake news targeting Shah Rukh Khan, as he has been a victim of misinformation in the past.
Exaggerate: The claim may exaggerate Shah Rukh Khan's stance on the issue by attributing a strong statement to him without any evidence.
Understate: There is no evidence to suggest that the claim understates any information.
Falters at times: The claim falters by not providing any credible evidence or sources to support the statement attributed to Shah Rukh Khan.
